articles.title: A national system to prioritize COVID-19 vaccines has largely failed as states rely on their own systems - USA TODAY
articles.description: Operation Warp Speed tried to help states set priorities for COVID-19 vaccine distribution with Tiberius. Few states use it as designed.
articles.content:

articles.title: Intel ordered to pay $2.18 billion in patent lawsuit - Engadget
articles.description: Intel has been ordered to pay $2.18 billion dollars after losing a lawsuit over two decade-old patents.
